channel.title: üè¢ National University of Defense Technology on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ National University of Defense Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Alleviate Anchor-Shift: Explore Blind Spots with Cross-View Reconstruction for Incomplete Multi-View Clustering
item.description: AIMC-CVR: A novel approach that alleviates anchor-shift in incomplete multi-view clustering via cross-view reconstruction, improving accuracy and scalability.

item.title: Clustering then Propagation: Select Better Anchors for Knowledge Graph Embedding
item.description: RecPiece: Relational Clustering for Better Knowledge Graph Embedding Anchors

item.title: Goal-Conditioned On-Policy Reinforcement Learning
item.description: GCPO: a novel on-policy goal-conditioned reinforcement learning framework tackles limitations of existing HER-based methods by effectively addressing multi-goal Markovian and non-Markovian reward prob…

item.title: LoD-Loc: Aerial Visual Localization using LoD 3D Map with Neural Wireframe Alignment
item.description: LoD-Loc: A novel aerial visual localization method uses lightweight LoD 3D maps & neural wireframe alignment for accurate and efficient 6-DoF pose estimation, surpassing state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Stability and Generalization of Asynchronous SGD: Sharper Bounds Beyond Lipschitz and Smoothness
item.description: Sharper ASGD generalization bounds achieved by leveraging on-average model stability, even without Lipschitz and smoothness assumptions; validated with diverse machine learning models.
